qas.question: What is the main lanuage of Bern?
What is the second most common language?
What percent of the population speaks German?

context: Most of the population (as of 2000[update]) speaks <a0_0>German<a0_0/> (104,465 or <a2_0>81.2%<a2_0/>) as their first language, <a1_0>Italian<a1_0/> is the second most common (5,062 or 3.9%) and French is the third (4,671 or 3.6%). There are 171 people who speak Romansh.
